description: Try our easy to follow Caprese Mac 'N' Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Caprese Mac 'N' Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in salted, boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain and return to pan.

Meanwhile, melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Add flour. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until bubbling. Gradually stir in milk. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until mixture thickens. Remove pan from heat. Stir in cheddar. Season with salt and pepper.

Add sauce to pasta and stir to coat. Transfer pasta mixture to 4 x 11/2 cup capacity ovenproof dishes. Top with bocconcini, then tomato. Bake for 25 minutes or until warmed through and tomato is tender.
Meanwhile, combine dip and oil in a small bowl. Serve pasta with pesto and scattered with basil.
